Class EventController

java.lang.Object
com.lucas.ticketsalesmanager.controllers.EventController
public class EventController extends Object
Controller for managing events, including registration, removal, and seat management.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    EventController()
    Constructs an EventController and initializes the EventDAO.

  • Constructor Details

    • EventController

      public EventController()
      Constructs an EventController and initializes the EventDAO.

  • Method Details

    • registerEvent

      public Event registerEvent(User user, Event event) throws EventAlreadyExistsException, InvalidEventDateException, UserNotAuthorizedException
      Registers a new event, throwing exceptions if the event already exists or has invalid data.
      Parameters:
      user - The user attempting to register the event.
      event - The event to be registered.
      Returns:
      The registered event.
      Throws:
      EventAlreadyExistsException - If an event with the same name already exists.
      InvalidEventDateException - If the event date is invalid.
      UserNotAuthorizedException - If the user is not an admin.

    • removeEvent

      public void removeEvent(String eventName) throws EventNotFoundException
      Removes an event by its name.
      Parameters:
      eventName - The name of the event to remove.
      Throws:
      EventNotFoundException - If the event cannot be found.

    • updateEvent

      public void updateEvent(Event event) throws EventNotFoundException, EventUpdateException
      Updates an event in the system.
      Parameters:
      event - The event with updated data.
      Throws:
      EventNotFoundException - If the event is not found.
      EventUpdateException - If the event cannot be updated.

    • addEventSeat

      public Event addEventSeat(String eventName, String seat) throws EventNotFoundException, EventUpdateException, SeatUnavailableException
      Adds a seat to an existing event.
      Parameters:
      eventName - The name of the event.
      seat - The seat to add.
      Returns:
      The updated event.
      Throws:
      EventNotFoundException - If the event cannot be found.
      EventUpdateException - If the event cannot be updated.
      SeatUnavailableException - If the seat is already reserved.

    • removeEventSeat

      public Event removeEventSeat(String eventName, String seat) throws EventNotFoundException, SeatUnavailableException, EventUpdateException
      Removes a seat from an existing event.
      Parameters:
      eventName - The name of the event.
      seat - The seat to remove.
      Returns:
      The updated event.
      Throws:
      EventNotFoundException - If the event cannot be found.
      SeatUnavailableException - If the seat is not reserved.
      EventUpdateException - If the event cannot be updated.

    • listEvents

      public List<Event> listEvents()
      Lists all events in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all events.

    • getEventByName

      public Event getEventByName(String eventName) throws EventNotFoundException
      Finds an event by its name.
      Parameters:
      eventName - The name of the event.
      Returns:
      The found event.
      Throws:
      EventNotFoundException - If the event cannot be found.

    • listAvailableEvents

      public List<Event> listAvailableEvents()
      Lists only available events that are currently active.
      Returns:
      A list of available events.
